item.description:
Join The People's Party (www.facebook.com/thepeoplespartymusic), Esthema (www.esthema.com) and The Brighton Beat (www.thebrightonbeat.com) on Friday, November 2 at the Davis Square Theatre located at 255 Elm Street in Davis Square, Somerville, MA. Doors open at 7:30 and the show starts at 8:00PM. 21+

A link to the event on Facebook is: https://www.facebook.com/events/466787676686064/

The evening kicks off at 8:00 with The Brighton Beat, "A positive Afrobeat force, bringing fresh world music to NYC/Boston and beyond. The Brighton Beat's inspired rhythms and powerful horn section keeps the crowd dancing and engaged in an intimate and creative atmosphere. The band promotes a vibrant image, focused on making intelligent instrumental music that is enjoyable and accessible to anyone." www.thebrightonbeat.com

At 9:30 Esthema, the band that has been hailed by Joel Simches of the Noise Magazine as "A true celebration of a number of different styles of world beat, jazz, rock, ethnic European and Middle Eastern traditional music" takes the stage. www.esthema.com

Topping it off, at 11PM, The People's Party, bringing their brand of rock, funk, hip-hop, jazz and folk, aka "hippie hop", take the stage! The collective is an up-tempo, groove-filled, conscious party. www.facebook.com/thepeoplespartymusic

Tickets are $10.00 at the door ($7.00 with a student ID) Tickets purchased on-line at http://worldfunkfusionhippiehopparty.brownpapertickets.com/ are $8.00 plus fees (total: $9.27).

Hope to see you there!
item.name: The Peopleâ€™s Party, Esthema and The Brighton Beat @ Davis Square Theatre
